mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDICAL_MEMBER ( MEM_NAME, MEM_TEL, MEM_RRN, ) VALUES( #{memName}, #{memTel}, #{memRrn},
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( CASE WHEN MEM_ROLE = 'ADMIN' THEN 'DOC_' WHEN MEM_ROLE = 'USER' THEN 'CLT_' ELSE 'UNKNOWN_' END, LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(MEM_NUM, LOCATE('_', MEM_NUM) + 1) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 5, '0') ) FROM medical_member WHERE MEM_ROLE = 'ADMIN'
